name: Keepsake Custom Photo Charm Bracelet
description:
Wear your favorite photo in your bracelet!

I've created this bracelet using a silver photo frame with etched heart designs. The corner hearts are embedded with light Siam Swarovski crystals. The bracelet itself consists of Swarovski Fire opal crystals, Czech crystals in Honey, with bicone and round glass beads in garnet red. The bead caps and tiny hexagon silver beads are sterling silver. 

The closure for the bracelet is a beautiful silver heart toggle clasp. The etchings on the photo frame are a lovely match with the toggle clasp.


❁ ❃ ❋ Custom Sizing ❁ ❃ ❋
The bracelet measures about 8.5 inches from end to end. I can easily shorten the bracelet to your preferred length; choose your length in the option box.


❁ ❃ ❋ Custom Picture ❁ ❃ ❋
The Swarovski photo frame measures 22mm (Width) x 18mm (Height). The photo frame has a clear plastic cover that protects your photo from wear. You can slide your photos in and out of the frame by using the bottom slot on the photo frame. Your bracelet will always be a new custom piece with your own pictures & photos. :)


Matching earrings are $15.00. Contact me if yo would like to purchase them.



✿ ❀ ❁SHIPPING✿ ❀ ❁
●Once payment has cleared, your purchase will be shipped within 24-48 hours via USPS First Class mail with delivery confirmation. I update the tracking number through PayPal.

International Mail is shipped via USPS First Class mail. USPS does not offer tracking with international First Class mail.


Become a fan on Facebook for extra savings!
www.facebook.com/KuerwynnForest



♥Thank you for looking!♥

name: Blue Skies
description:
Blue Skies is created using light blue cats eye disks. In between the cats eye are two sterling silver disks with an iridescent blue glass bead snuggled between both. The closure for Blue Skies is a sterling silver toggle clasp.

The length of the bracelet is 8.5 inches; I can easily shorten Blue Skies to your preferred length; choose your length in options.

Blue Skies has a matching set of earrings for $15.00. Contact me if you would like to purchase a pair.

name: Heart of Jade
description:
Heart of Jade is my creation using aged copper and pink Jade.  
The heart has been lightly hammered for a lovely textured effect around the edges. I've wrapped the pink jade to the heart also using aged copper wire. The circumference of the bracelet is 6.5 inches.

This bracelet is designed to open (and close) by sliding the scroll work 'clasp' on and off the frame of the heart.

The matching copper and jade earrings are $15.00. Contact me if you would like to purchase them. 


✿ ❀ ❁SHIPPING✿ ❀ ❁

name: Mother of Pearl Wood Hair Sticks
description:
•:*¨¨*:•. Custom Lengths available! •:*¨¨*:•.

These hair sticks are created from wood, wrapped at the tips with 100% black hemp cord. These are unique in that they start out square at the top of the hair sticks, and slowly round down to a circular tip.

I've decorated each end of the cord with purple amethyst beads, silver cherry blossoms, and snuggled in between are Mother of Pearl beads. The Mother of Pearl beads are made with a variety of blue hues. The purple beads are a rich dark purple, with an AB finish on one side of the crystal; which really highlights the cut of the crystals.

Right click on your mouse and choose "view" to see a larger picture of the hair sticks.

ღஐƸ̵̡Ӝ̵̨̄Ʒஐღ
You may choose a different length for these hair sticks - 9 inches through 5 inches.

Chop Sticks Utensils
ღ I no longer coat the wood with lacquer, therefore these can also be used as one of a kind chop sticks. ღ



❁❀SHIPPING❁❀
The hair sticks will be created and ready for shipment within 4 days. The 6 inch hair sticks are already created and ready for shipment today.

Domestic shipping is via USPS First Class mail with delivery confirmation. I update the tracking number through PayPal.

International shipping is via USPS First Class Mail. USPS does not offer tracking/delivery confirmation with International orders.
